summary:
Electrical engineer with 3 years of industrial experience in electrical design and maintenence of projects. Dedicated to excel within a team that is working on challenging projects. I am currently seeking an engineering position, which offers diverse responsibilities and challenges where I can fully utilize my technical knowledge to the development of the company while creating a rewarding space for self-growth in my career. 

• Electrical project engineer working in international projects together with a multidisciplinary teams of engineers.
• Knowledge of the design and installation of networks such as PROFIBUS, AS-i bus and Industrial Ethernet.
• Knowledge in  power distribution systems specialy in low voltage systems
• Wide knowledge in EPLAN, AutoCAD and GAMS Software Packages

projects:
[{'title': 'Preliminary Energy Audit at Ministry of Defense, Sri Lanka', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'The analysis consists of building electricity conservation methods, air conditioning system and electrical energy system compatibility with the norms stated in the Code of Practice for Energy Efficient Buildings in Sri Lanka. 
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Sustainable Green Energy Production by Steam Plasma Gasification using Municipal Solid Waste of Western Province of Sri Lanka', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'In this case study mainly focused to find energy harvesting potential from MSW in the
western province of Sri Lanka as it was identified that MSW collected in western province of Sri Lanka is approximately 2100 tons per day and composition of biomass content was approximately 80%. This project was carried out during the TIME summer school 2016.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Integration of Sustainable Energy in Sumba Island, Indonesia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'This project aims to identify technical and business proposals that would aid in the transformation of the Sumba island, Indonesia into a fully renewable one with collaborating with HIVOS ( A dutch NGO, working on projects to improve the life style of the people in developing countries.). Apart from the 100% electrification project proposals, the team is aiming to train the local community and help improve the quality of life by focusing on social aspects related to energy systems use and maintenance especially in sustainable tourism. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Sustainable Power Generation and Efficient Process Management for Carbon Neutral Operations at Wijeya Newspapers Limited, Sri Lanka', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'The main target of the project was to identify the best practical aspects related to setting up a renewable energy power plant using the available resources of the company. First the project had multiple objectives within the primary goal. Inside that objective feasibility study on wind energy harvesting and solar energy harvesting was carried out. Different parameters had been analyzed and applied for the technologies - from technological and economic to environmental, legacy and social parameters. Mainly this project focused on implementation rooftop solar and a hybrid renewable energy generation plant (Solar and Biomass).  ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Energy Audit for De Lanerolle Brother (Pvt) Ltd, Sri Lanka', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'The analysis consists of building electricity conservation methods, air conditioning system and water circulating system. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Pre-feasibility study for Muthukelina Ara Mini Hydro Plant', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'This study was carried out as a partial fulfillment of the course Small Hydro Project Development of MSc in Electrical Engineering.  The scope of the study was to evaluate the feasibility of building and operating a mini-hydroelectric power generation plant based on Muthukelina Ara River in Ratnapura District. The feasible site selection, design of the hydro power components, selection of the suitable power station equipment and study of economic value were carried out.
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}, {'title': 'Final Year Undergraduate Project: Railway Warning and Control Systems  ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'This is an implemented system on the sensor network based railway warning and control system. With the main objective of providing the protection to the public at the unmanned railway crossings this system is implemented. In order to implement a railway warning in each and every railway crossing this system is developed in economic way. The sensors at the sensor node which is kept away from the railway crossing detect the train and the signal is send to the center node via RF transceivers to actuate the warning lights and the siren alarm at the center node. My contributions were Design and implement power management circuit which includes switching circuit for solar power supply, voltage regulating circuit, LED lamp power circuit and Documentation ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sachini', 'last_name': 'Thiyambarawattage', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Technical Proposal Engineer at Siemens'}]}]

• Administration of the Computerized Maintenance Management System of both sites.
 • Handle electrical installation works of the Instrumentation Project specially installing Strong Motion Accelerometer.

• Direct communication with contractors. 
• Handle procurement works related to the Dam Safety and Water Resource Planning Project Phase II  and other general office purchasing.
